programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My 16-Year-Old Sister Is Out of Control / My BFF Doesn’t Care about My Trauma
programme.desc: Dionna thinks her younger sister is headed down the wrong path to nowhere! On top of that she's boy crazy.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Stop Spending My Money at the Strip Club
programme.desc: Aaliyah loves her man but had to put him on probation when she found out that he was cheating with strippers!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Your Mom Drugged Me so You'd Leave; Unlock: You Can't Delete Deceit
programme.desc: Shaunte comes from a big family, but when a man named Syrrome came out of nowhere claiming to be her brother, she immediately had doubts; Janae believes that her partner, Mykeah, is cheating on her with a man.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Crack Saved My Life; DNA Mystery: You or Your Brother?
programme.desc: While Tahquisha says she has cleaned up her act since meeting Jermaine, he believes she is still prostituting; Xavier is convinced that his wife's newborn son is his brother's.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Where Did I Go Wrong With My Kids? / Unlock: Can We Make It Down The Aisle?
programme.desc: On Karamo, Gerri feels disrespected by her children and seeks help to understand why. Meanwhile, William, 26 years older than his fiancée China, faces her doubts about his fidelity and her demand to unlock his phone before marriage.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Are You Sleeping With Her?; Teen Daughter, Stop Fighting!
programme.desc: Allen suspects that good friend Big Baby is trying to steal his girlfriend, Ja'meisha; Nikki says her daughter, Aanasia, has become so combative that she's thinking about kicking her out of the house -- but Aanasia blames her mother for the turmoil.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Tunde Oyeneyin on Grief, Love, & Growth / Unlock My Mom and Dad’s Phone
programme.desc: Tunde discusses her battle with weight, the loss of her mother, father and brother and more life experiences.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Karamo & His Son Share Their Story of Addiction
programme.desc: Karamo's son Jason recounts a string of events that led him to a near-death experience with drugs.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Is The Man On My Birth Certificate My Father?/ My Daughter Has Been Suspended 100 Times!
programme.desc: Debbie has been on a quest to find her biological father, and she may have solved this paternity puzzle.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Top 10 Most Outrageous Guests of 2009
programme.desc: MAURY rings in the new year by counting down his most outrageous guests of 2009.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I've Taken 21 DNA Tests...I'll Prove I'm Not the Dad!
programme.desc: Is Melvin being duped by De’Ja and his sister Sequoia or did he father De’Ja’s baby? Then, is Gary the father of sweet Fantasia? Plus, Walter has taken 2 paternity tests for his girlfriend Renee’s kids!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Maury's Truth Test…Cheating Men Exposed!
programme.desc: These guests simply can't keep their hands to themselves when faced with a tempting situation and find themselves in deep trouble with their partners. Just how much can a person take before they are ready to toss that cheating spouse to the curb?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Secrets! Did My Sister's Fiance Get Me Pregnant!
programme.desc: Richell and Ryan have been together through thick and thin. But their world was turned upside down when Richell's cousin Deanna revealed that she had slept with Ryan and that he might be the father of her 1 year old child.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Did My Husband Cheat and Make an X-Rated Movie?
programme.desc: The cheaters are in the hot seat and only the lie-detector results will reveal the truth. Ramona is here with her daughters because they all swear that Lawrence is cheating. Then, Melissa says that she found an adult movie starring her husband.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With Dustin, Justin and Derrick ... Who's My Baby's Dad?
programme.desc: You've never seen paternity action like this! Dustin's here to find out if he or one of his two best friends are the father of Kaylin's baby. Plus, Ronald's sister swears that there's no way that he's the father of Christina's baby.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Sleep Around...My Husband's Not Your Baby's Dad!
programme.desc: These women are here to find out once and for all who the fathers of their children really are. But these men won't step up and take responsibility until they know for sure that the kids belong to them. MAURY's got all the results of these shocking DNA stories.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Will My Fiancee Forgive Me? I Slept With Her Step-Mother!
programme.desc: Autumn caught Antoine cheating with her best friend of 10 years and suspects he may be detailing cars for sex.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Is My Fiance Cheating When He Says He's at Church?
programme.desc: Charisse thinks her fiancé Deon cheated with her best friend Shante. Then Jessica believes her child’s dad Ronald slept with her cousin. Jennifer wants a lie detector test to find out if her boyfriend had sex with another women.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With My Husband's Nephew…Who's the Dad?
programme.desc: These women are here to find out once and for all who the fathers of their children really are. But these men won't step up and take responsibility until they know for sure that the kids belong to them.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You're 14…Stop Bragging About Sex and Violence!
programme.desc: Kimberly is a teen mother who refuses to take care of her own baby. Jurina has been pregnant multiple times and doesn't think she needs to change. Can Maury's team of experts help these girls change their lives for the better?

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Are The Worst Landlord Ever!
programme.desc: Daniyal is suing her landlord for shutting off her electric, cutting the gas, and evicting her without notice.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Meddling with Her Health
programme.desc: Linda Morris says she bought some jewelry from the defendant’s shop, but once she started wearing it she broke out in a terrible rash. She had to seek medical treatment for the blisters the cheap jewelry caused, but this shady businessman refuses to return her money or pay her doctor’s bill. Sergio says Linda purchased 14kt gold items but came back claiming she was allergic to gold. He exchanged the items for silver, and again she returned claiming allergies. He can’t predict every customer’s medical history and he doesn’t give refunds. He’s accused of meddling with someone’s health.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Father/Daughter Crisis
programme.desc: Frank sues his daughter Patricia, claiming she pocketed $2,010 in insurance money after a car accident. Patricia says the car was a gift, she paid insurance, and blames his new partner for turning him against her.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: You Installed the Wrong Tiles in My Bathroom!
programme.desc: Jennifer Clayton sues Angela Elliott for $4,069.07 after receiving mismarked tiles that didn't match her bathroom. Angela offered free replacements but refused to cover installation costs, arguing Jennifer should’ve noticed the error.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Neighbor Nightmare
programme.desc: Cherry Smith sues neighbor Mitchell Martinez for $3,000, claiming his loud behavior damaged her mirror and door. Mitchell denies the accusations, calling Cherry a long-time complainer. He countersues for $1,000, alleging harassment and missed work.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Antique Repair Uproar
programme.desc: James has not paid Carlita for restoring an antique stove because he feels he was coerced into the repairs.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Remote Control Chopper Theft
programme.desc: When Paul's pricy remote control helicopter "disappears" from Sean's consignment shop, Paul claims foul play.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Show Me The Proof!
programme.desc: Karamo helps Diamond dig deep after feeling caught in the middle of her parents who argue over everything.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Hospital Hook Up
programme.desc: After moving in together, Mackie is suing Joel for unlawfully locking her out.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Cruise Sinks A Family
programme.desc: Tania is suing her child's father for not reimbursing her for a cruise his daughter from another woman came on.
